newsitem.title: MAURITIUS: Mauritius rupee weakens on dollar and pound.
newsitem.headline: Mauritius rupee weakens on dollar and pound.

text.p: The Mauritian rupee weakened against both the dollar and the pound on Friday, reflecting international trends, commercial bank dealers said.
The rupee was quoted at a commercial bank mean rate of 20.3290 to a dollar on Friday from 20.3145 on Thursday.
Against the pound, the rupee traded at a mean of 31.5330 from 31.4835 on Thursday.
Dealers said the dollar's strengthening in overnight international markets was mainly behind its strengthening versus the rupee on Friday.
"On the top of the dollar's international strengthening, you still have to add that chronic shortage of foreign reserves in local commercial banks here," one dealer said.
